built_with.role: code generation, manifests, documentation, UX polish

principles: No secrets committed to the repo.
Read-only XRPL access from public endpoints.
Live on-ledger data only; no hardcoded prices.
Exact file casing and config placement (baseline safety).
audit_notes: Agents should validate manifests against the published JSON Schema.
Price/quotes must come from XRPL book_offers and/or amm_info.
